style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">import { StrictMode } from " react " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">import { createRoot } from " react-dom/client " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">import App from " ./ App.tsx " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">import { ApolloClient , &nbsp;ApolloLink , &nbsp;InMemoryCache , &nbsp;HttpLink } from " @apollo/client " ;&nbsp;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">import { ApolloProvider } from " @apollo/client/react " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const link = new ApolloLink ( ( operation , &nbsp;forward ) =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	operation.setContext ( ( prev ) =&gt; {</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	...prev,</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	headers: {</span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	authorization: "ADMIN"</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>};</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} );</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return forward ( operation ) ;</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">} );</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const client = new ApolloClient ( {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	link: ApolloLink.from ( [</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	link,</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	new HttpLink ( {</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	uri: "http://~~~~"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} )</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>] ) ,</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	cache: new InMemoryCache()</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">} ) ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">createRoot ( document.getElementById ( " root " ) ! ) . render (</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;ApolloProvider client={client}&gt;</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;StrictMode&gt;</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt;App /&gt;</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">&lt;/StrictMode&gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">&lt;/ApolloProvider&gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">)</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="1169.5" width="854" x="536" y="810.5" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-52" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="900" width="470" x="1460" y="800" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jmOC1G9fSItSnOtsKdpn-53" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;fontSize=16;" value="<div style="line-height: 200%;">import { gql } from " @apollo/client " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;">import { useQuery } from " @apollo/client/react " ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const GET_ALL_USERS = gql `</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	query GetAllUsers {</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getAllUsers {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	name</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	age</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span>}</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">` ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">const App = () =&gt; {</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	const { data } = useQuery (&nbsp;</span>GET_ALL_USERS&nbsp;<span style="white-space: pre;">) :</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	return ( &lt; ul &gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	{ data ? . getAllUsers . map ( ( user ) =&gt; {</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt; li &gt;</span></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	&lt; span &gt; { user.id } </span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">&lt; / span &gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">				&lt; span &gt;</span><span style="white-space: pre;"> { user.name } </span><span style="white-space: pre;">&lt; / span &gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">				&lt; span &gt;</span><span style="white-space: pre;"> { user.age } </span><span style="white-space: pre;">&lt; / span &gt;</span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>&lt; / li &gt;</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>} ) }</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>&lt; / ul &gt; ) ;</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">} ;</div><div style="line-height: 200%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 200%;">export default App ;</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="877.5" width="405" x="1490"
